Html:
Currently it is being serialized as follows 

 <CUR>
        <CUR01>SE</CUR01>
        <CUR02>
          <CUR0201>USD</CUR0201>
          <CUR0202 />
        </CUR02>
  </CUR>

Is there any reason why it is not serialized like this (below)?

<CUR>
        <CUR01>SE</CUR01>
        <CUR02>USD</CUR02>
</CUR>

Your content contains a sub-element delimiter in it that is causing the 2nd element to be broken down.

The sub-element delimiter is specified in character 105 of the ISA segment.
Sometimes this happens because the sender is unaware that they have used a delimiter as content in their actual message.
